sections.heading: Answer or other pleading filed prior to signing of default judgmentNotwithstanding the provisions of Article 1001, the defendant may file his answer or other pleading at any time prior to the signing of a default judgment against him
sections.text: Acts 2017, No. 419, ยง1; Acts 2021, No. 174, ยง1, eff. Jan. 1, 2022.
